long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple, two-panel, Norton Commander-inspired bookmark manager.

This adds a new user interface for managing and organising your bookmarks.
All the actions in this extension are backed by the standard Chrome Bookmark API.

Apart from the main navigation, here are some of things you can do with this extension:
- Create, edit and delete bookmarks and folders
- Select multiple rows, using Ctrl/Cmd/Shift + Mouse click/Space key
- Drag and drop between panels, or into folders
- Search within your bookmark collection
- Open multiple selected bookmarks in new tabs with mouse middle click
- Navigate using your keyboard (Arrow keys, Enter, Backspace, Tab)
- Switch between Light or Dark themes

Here's what's not (yet) supported:
- Clipboard actions, copy-paste of items
- Context menus
- Deletion of non-empty folders

This extension is a Free and Open Source application. The code is available on GitHub under a BSD license: https://github.com/CezarLeahu/bookmark-commander
